## JsonCompatible.ArrayConverter type

A converter which converts a supplied `unknown` value to a valid array of [JsonCompatible](./ts-json-base.jsoncompatibletype.md) values.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ArrayConverter<T, TC = unknown> = BaseConverter<JsonCompatibleType<T>[], TC>;
```
**References:** [JsonCompatibleType](./ts-json-base.jsoncompatibletype.md)
